caption.center: IN THE MATTER OF THE ESTATE OF BONIFACIO BALANAY, SR., Deceased.

opinion.posture: APPEALS FROM THE FIRST CIRCUIT COURT (NOS. 22759 and 23389 (PROBATE NO. 89-0165))
opinion.attorneys: Dennis Balanay, beneficiary-appellant pro se, on the motion
opinion.panel: MOON, C.J., LEVINSON, NAKAYAMA, RAMIL, and ACOBA, JJ.
opinion.opinion_text: ORDER DENYING MOTION FOR RECONSIDERATION The motion for reconsideration filed on May 29, 2001 by the beneficiary-appellant Dennis Balanay, acting pro se, requesting that this court reconsider its summary disposition order, filed on May 16, 2001, is hereby denied.
